claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: Screenshot of the top of a journal article from Vaccine (Elsevier), showing the journal name, homepage URL, and the beginning of the article title relating to vaccine effectiveness of recombinant and standard dose influenza vaccines. does not support the claim because the image contains only the journal header and article title without any data or statements about mutations in cell- or egg-based vaccine production. Note: The image is limited to the article header and title; no figures, study data, or statements relevant to vaccine production mutations are visible.
